mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Judero Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
